name: stream-of-consciousness-ui
description: UI for Stream of Consciousness Analyzer - Transform unstructured thoughts into organized insights

scripts.build: bash -c 'set -e; rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && for file in index.html styles.css enhanced-styles.css script.js bridge-init.js; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then cp -a "$file" dist/; fi; done'
